goal.ch: 讓學生在專題演講及準備報告中獲得各領域最新資訊培養專業知識。
goal.en:
"週次 內容 備註
1 通訊系統領域演講 
2 訊號處理領域演講 
3 通訊網路領域演講

outline.ch:
Part One: Listening
Attend the invited talks and submit a one-page report.
Part Two: Presentation
Every student has to give a presentation in this class.
outline.en:
"週次 內容 備註
1 Speech：Communication System field
2 Speech：Signal Processing field
3 Speech：Communication Networks field
4 Student Presentation

16 Student Presentation

18 Student Presentation"
